examples.example: 这件高级定制的服装让她在聚会上光彩照人。

translate.english: This advanced custom-made clothing made her shine at the party.

examples.example: 他凭借自己的努力进入了一家高级公司工作。

translate.english: He entered a senior company to work by virtue of his own efforts.

examples.example: 他在高级餐厅里享用了一顿美味的大餐。

translate.english: He enjoyed a delicious big meal in an upscale restaurant.
